abstract: Thousands of high school students in Brazzaville, Point Noire and Dolisie in Republic of Congo stage violent protests over government's decision to cancel exams of graduating students after test questions were leaked and shared on social media.
lead_paragraph: Thousands of high school students pelted the police with stones and damaged property in violent protests Friday.

headline.main: Republic of Congo: High School Students Protest After Exams Are Canceled Over Leak of Questions
headline.print_headline: Africa; Republic of Congo: High School Students Protest After Exams Are Canceled Over Leak of Questions

snippet: Thousands of high school students pelted the police with stones and damaged property in violent protests Friday.
